function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourism in the region","Impact":"Risk of widespread illness and potential loss of life","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and sanitation protocols, enhance healthcare infrastructure in the region","Technologies":"Health monitoring technology, sanitation systems","People":"Local population, tourists, hospitality workers","Owner":"Local government, tourism industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Disconnecting from over-connected life may impact awareness of health and safety measures","Impact":"Reduced vigilance and compliance with health guidelines and protocols","Mitigation":"Provide education and awareness programs on health and safety, promote responsible tourism practices","Technologies":"Online education platforms, communication tools","People":"Tourists, hospitality workers","Owner":"Tourism industry stakeholders, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Increased contact with nature may expose visitors to environmental health risks","Impact":"Potential exposure to wildlife-borne diseases and natural hazards","Mitigation":"Educate visitors on environmental risks, provide protective gear and safety guidelines","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, safety equipment","People":"Tourists, local guides","Owner":"Tourism operators, conservation organizations"}]}
